SEARCH
Package src.controller

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
src.controller.DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
Controller class that handles doctor operations including managing appointments, medical records and patient data. This class serves as the main interface between doctors and the hospital system.

  • Constructor Summary
